translation.title: Do you have a representative?
translation.subtitle: Such as an adviser or support worker who’s helping you with your appeal.
translation.registerList: Registering them means they’ll be able to:
translation.info: receive personal information about your appeal
translation.evidence: submit evidence (and see any that’s submitted)
translation.talkToUs: talk to us on your behalf about your appeal
translation.phoneUp: If you don’t have the details to hand, you can phone up and register a representative after you’ve submitted your appeal.

error.required: You have to say whether you have a representative. Select either yes or no.
